attributes.action: Legal action against those involved in vandalising memorials in the name of BLM
attributes.additional_details: Sites like this have nothing to do with the current political and racial issues going on around the world and I do not believe that such actions are representing the movement in the correct way; I find it disgraceful that people think that it is appropriate to ever do such things and that legal action should be taken against them.
attributes.background: To actively prosecute those involved in vandalising & desecrating memorials, statues and historical/ Important sites in the name of BLM/BLMUK.

rejection.details:
Decisions on whether to arrest and prosecute alleged offenders is a matter for local police forces and the Crown Prosecution Service, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Protect all monuments and statues from being taken down: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/325814

Make it a specific offence to desecrate national flags, symbols and monuments: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/325545

Require referendums on the removal of historically significant statues: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/326361
